skills.name: Benevolence
skills.description: During your playing phase, you can give any amount of hand cards to any other players.  If the total number of cards given away is 2 or more, you regain 1 health.

skills.name: Rouse
skills.description: Monarch Ability: You can ask any Shu characters to use a [Strike] for you.

skills.name: Stargazing
skills.description: At the beginning of your turn, you can view X number of cards from the top of the deck (X equals to the number of players still in play with X having maximum of 5). Of these X cards, you can choose any number of cards to place at the top of the pile and rest are to be placed at the bottom of the pile.

skills.name: Desolate
skills.description: Enforced Ability: When you have no hand cards, you cannot become the target of [Strike] or [Duel].

skills.name: Dragonheart
skills.description: You can use hand cards [Strike] as [Dodge], and [Dodge] as [Strike].

skills.name: Paladin
skills.description: You can use any ♥ or ♦ suit cards as [Strike].

skills.name: Enlightenment
skills.description: Every time you use a non delayed scroll card (before it activates), you can immediately draw a card.

skills.name: Prodigy
skills.description: Any scroll cards you use have no range limit.

skills.name: Horsemanship
skills.description: Enforced Ability: You will always have -1 distance in any range calculations.

skills.name: Ironsteed
skills.description: When you use [Strike] on any target player, you can choose to make a Judgement. If the Judgement Result is a ♥ or ♦, the [Strike] cannot be evaded.

skills.name: Berserk
skills.description: During your playing phase, you can use any number of [Strike].

skills.name: Formation
skills.description: Enforced Ability: When you have no armour equipped, it will always appear as if you have [Eight Trigrams] equipped.

skills.name: Arson
skills.description: During your playing phase, you can use any ♥ or ♦ suit hand cards as [Fire Attack].

skills.name: Decipher
skills.description: You can use any ♠ or ♣ hand cards as [Ward].
